noPosition.message: It is not possible to find current position. Make sure that is enabled the research of the current position by clicking on Enable Position. If you do not want enable detection of the position, choose the point of search by clicking on Choose Manual Position and touching a point on the map, otherwise it will not possible to perform researches.
noPosition.title: Position Not Found

chooseThreeSearchCenter.message: Select the center of the search area of services or the location where you want to know the weather.
chooseThreeSearchCenter.title: Search
